title: Crackshot精良枪械分享
author: 蓝之魂
txt_content:
本帖最后由 蓝之魂 于 2020-5-5 10:28 编辑 
序言注册了好几年的账号，
今天突然想到自己到现在还是5级号，
甚至因为搜索和评分的问题金粒告急，
所以就想着发布点东西来赚点金粒，
但是奈何囊中羞涩没有好端和好地图
而且也找不到什么自己能搬的空缺插件
于是就跑过来发布一些自己写的东西
希望各位看官在拿了配置后不要忘记赏点金粒和人气！
音效很渣十分抱歉！PS：请自行在Projectile_Damage行修改枪械伤害


灭绝者Renot-Huoll【狙击枪】mie:    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&8&l灭绝者&c&lRenot-Huoll"
        Item_Type: 274
        Item_Lore: "&a&m--------&b[&c&l领袖级武器&b]&a&m--------|&a&l枪械威力:&a&l■■■■■■■■■&7&l■|&a&l最大射程:&a&l■■■■■■■■■■|&a&l弹夹容量:&a&l■■■■■&7&l■■■■■|&a&l换弹速度:&a&l■■■&7&l■■■■■■■|&a&m----------------------------|&4&l[可开启8倍瞄准镜]|&4&l[攻击回复生命值]|&4&l[攻击60%几率追加400点伤害]|&4&l[附加瞬间伤害效果]|&4&l[领袖级武器专属击杀信息]|&a&m----------------------------|&8&l运用阿丽卡塔最尖端的技术制造|&8&l敌人的护甲在它面前是如此脆弱|&8&l能在一瞬间摧毁10面城墙"
        Sounds_Acquired: BAT_TAKEOFF-1-1-0
    Shooting:
        Dual_Wield: false
        Right_Click_To_Shoot: true
        Delay_Between_Shots: 30
        Recoil_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Speed: 140
        Projectile_Type: energy
        Projectile_Subtype: 140-0.1-10-10
        Removal_Or_Drag_Delay: 100-true
        Projectile_Damage: 400
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions:: true
        Remove_Bullet_Drop: true
        Bullet_Spread: 0.1
        Sounds_Shoot: WITHER_IDLE-1-1-0,FUSE-1-1-0
    Reload:
        Enable: true
        Reload_Amount: 16
        Take_Ammo_On_Reload: true 
        Reload_Bullets_Individually: false
        Reload_Duration: 100
        Sounds_Reloading: FIRE_IGNITE-1-1-4,DOOR_OPEN-1-2-6,FIRE_IGNITE-1-1-36,HURT_FLESH-1-0-37,DOOR_CLOSE-1-2-38
        Sounds_Out_Of_Ammo: ITEM_BREAK-1-1-0
    Sneak:
        Enable: true
        No_Recoil: true
        Bullet_Spread: 0.1
        Sneak_Before_Shooting: false
    Scope:
        Enable: true
        Night_Vision: true
        Zoom_Amount: 8
        Zoom_Bullet_Spread: 0.1
        Zoom_Before_Shooting: false
        Sounds_Toggle_Zoom: NOTE_STICKS-1-2-0
    Headshot:
        Enable: true
        Bonus_Damage: 400
        Message_Shooter: "&8&l命中目标头部，额外造成伤害"
    Potion_Effects:
        Activation: hit,
        Potion_Effect_Shooter: REGENERATION-60-3
        Potion_Effect_Victim: HARM-10-3
    Particles:
        Enable: true
        Particle_Hit: LIGHTNING
        Particle_Player_Shoot: BLOCK_BREAK-86
    Abilities:
        Death_No_Drop: true
        Reset_Hit_Cooldown: true
        Knockback: 5
    Firearm_Action:
        Type: slide
        Open_Duration: 20
        Close_Duration: 20
        Close_Shoot_Delay: 10
        Reload_Open_Delay: 5
        Reload_Close_Delay: 5
        Sound_Open: FIREWORK_BLAST-1-1-0
        Sound_Close: FIZZ-1-1-0,GLASS-1-1-0
    Backstab:
        Enable: true
        Bonus_Damage: 175
        Sounds_Shooter: VILLAGER_HIT-1-1-0
        Sounds_Victim: VILLAGER_HIT-1-1-0
    Critical_Hits:
        Enable: true
        Bonus_Damage: 400
        Chance: 60
        Sounds_Shooter: ANVIL_LAND-1-2-0
        Sounds_Victim: ANVIL_LAND-1-2-0
    Custom_Death_Message:
        Normal: "&8&l可怜的&c&l<victim>&8&l惨死在灭绝者的枪管下"
    Hit_Events:
        Enable: true
        Message_Victim: "&8*l你被灭绝者盯上了！"
        Message_Shooter: "&8&l灭绝者已经找到目标！"
        Sounds_Impact: ARROW_HIT-1-1-0
        Sounds_Shooter: SHOOT_ARROW-1-2-0
        Sounds_Victim: DIG_WOOD-1-1-0        
希望各位看官在拿了配置后不要忘记赏点金粒和人气！
Enss火舌【霞弹枪（or喷子）】huo:    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&7&lEnss&c&l火舌"
        Item_Type: 376
        Item_Lore: "&a&m--------&b[&c&l领袖级武器&b]&a&m--------|&a&l枪械威力:&a&l■■■■■■■■■■|&a&l最大射程:&a&l■■&7&l■■■■■■■■|&a&l弹夹容量:&a&l■■■■■■■■&7&l■■|&a&l换弹速度:&a&l■■■&7&l■■■■■■■|&a&m----------------------------|&4&l[烈焰喷射点燃目标]|&4&l[毒火将会腐蚀目标]|&4&l[攻击10%几率附加20点伤害]|&4&l[攻击将会牵引目标]|&4&l[领袖级武器专属击杀信息]|&a&m----------------------------|&c&l分解特制燃料产生高温火焰|&c&l高温毒火将腐蚀一切金属|&c&l敌人一定会被它烧地死无全尸"
        Sounds_Acquired: BAT_TAKEOFF-1-1-0
    Shooting:
        Dual_Wield: false
        Right_Click_To_Shoot: true
        Delay_Between_Shots: 1
        Recoil_Amount: 0
        Projectile_Amount: 12
        Projectile_Speed: 12
        Projectile_Type: egg
        Removal_Or_Drag_Delay: 6-true
        Projectile_Damage: 4
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions:: true
        Projectile_Flames: true
        Projectile_Incendiary:
            Enable: true
            Duration: 80
        Bullet_Spread: 1.6
        Sounds_Shoot: ITEM_BREAK-1-1-0
    Reload:
        Enable: true
        Reload_Amount: 100
        Take_Ammo_On_Reload: true 
        Reload_Bullets_Individually: false
        Reload_Duration: 100
        Sounds_Reloading: FIRE_IGNITE-1-1-4,DOOR_OPEN-1-2-6,FIRE_IGNITE-1-1-36,HURT_FLESH-1-0-37,DOOR_CLOSE-1-2-38
        Sounds_Out_Of_Ammo: ITEM_BREAK-1-1-0
    Potion_Effects:
        Activation: shoot,hit,head,reload,
        Potion_Effect_Victim: POISON-40-5
    Particles:
        Enable: true
        Particle_Hit: SMOKE
        Particle_Player_Shoot: BLOCK_BREAK-26
    Abilities:
        Death_No_Drop: true
        Reset_Hit_Cooldown: true
        Knockback: -1
    Burstfire:
        Enable: true
        Shots_Per_Burst: 3
        Delay_Between_Shots_In_Burst: 0     
    Firearm_Action:
        Type: slide
        Open_Duration: 20
        Close_Duration: 20
        Close_Shoot_Delay: 5
        Reload_Open_Delay: 5
        Reload_Close_Delay: 5
        Sound_Open: FIREWORK_BLAST-1-1-0
        Sound_Close: FIZZ-1-1-0,GLASS-1-1-0
    Critical_Hits:
        Enable: true
        Bonus_Damage: 20
        Chance: 10
        Sounds_Shooter: ANVIL_LAND-1-2-0
        Sounds_Victim: ANVIL_LAND-1-2-0
    Custom_Death_Message:
        Normal: "&d&l<victim>&c&l被&d&l<shooter>&c&l活活烧死"
希望各位看官在拿了配置后不要忘记赏点金粒和人气！
千金火炮【散射机枪/集束机枪】
qianjin1:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&e&l千金&c&l火炮"
        Item_Type: 284
        Item_Lore: "&a------&c[战争武器]&a------|&6熔铸了千斤的黄金打造而成|&6身为火炮却拥有超远的射程|&b&l可切换&c&l散射模式/集射模式|&c&l[散射]&6多颗发射，威力较低|&c&l[集射]&6单颗发射，威力较高|&b散射模式炮弹无法穿透墙壁|&b集射模式炮弹可以穿透墙壁|&f&l[PVE伤害加成：100%]"

蒲公英【剑】（描述中无视攻速影响是相对于1.12.2）
pgy:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&e&l蒲公&f&l&n英"
        Item_Type: 283
        Item_Lore: "&f&l&m-------------------------|&b&l◆ &7几株柔弱感性的蒲公英|&b&l◆ &7因空虚无目而聚在一起|&b&l◆ &7最终也会在不经意间|&b&l◆ &7被春风带走|&b&l◆ &7回到幸福的归家的长路|&f&l&m-------------------------|&b&l◆ &a攻击无视攻速影响|&b&l◆ &a攻击有10%概率&4&l暴击|&b&l◆ &a命中目标会回复生命|&b&l◆ &a此武器玩家死亡将不会掉落|&b&l◆ &f&l【&c&l不可附魔&f&l】"

        Remove_Unused_Tag: true
        Melee_Mode: true

桃灼【盾牌】（仅1.9以上版本可用）
tz:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&c&l桃&4&l&n灼"
        Item_Type: 442
        Item_Lore: "&f&l&m-------------------------|&b&l◆ &7想住得更靠近太阳，沉落海底|&b&l◆ &7存在着，这对我而言的确是一种奢望|&b&l◆ &7人生而孤独，死亦孤独|&b&l◆ &7更不用背负任何沉重的包袱|&b&l◆ &7孤独是毒药，亦或是良药|&f&l&m-------------------------|&b&l◆ &a在主手时，抵挡一切伤害|&b&l◆ &a无法抵挡负面状态和摔伤|&b&l◆ &a攻击会极大地击退目标|&b&l◆ &a此武器玩家死亡将不会掉落|&b&l◆ &f&l【&c&l不可在副手使用&f&l】|&b&l◆ &f&l【&c&l不可附魔&f&l】"

        Dual_Wield: false
        Right_Click_To_Shoot: true
        Delay_Between_Shots: 1
        Recoil_Amount: 5
        Projectile_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Speed: 1
        Projectile_Type: energy
        Projectile_Subtype: 1-0.1-1-1
        Removal_Or_Drag_Delay: 2-true
        Projectile_Damage: 1
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions:: true
        Remove_Bullet_Drop: true
        Projectile_Incendiary:
            Enable: true
            Duration: 100
        Bullet_Spread: 0.1
        Sounds_Shoot: EXPLODE-1-1-0,ZOMBIE_WOOD-1-1-0
    Burstfire:
        Enable: true
        Shots_Per_Burst: 2
        Delay_Between_Shots_In_Burst: 1
    Particles:
        Enable: true
        Particle_Player_Shoot: SMOKE
    Abilities:
        Death_No_Drop: true
        Reset_Hit_Cooldown: true
        Jetpack_Mode: true
        Super_Effective: PLAYER-0.50,ZOMBIE-1.0
希望各位看官在拿了配置后不要忘记赏点金粒和人气！

replies.author: 蓝之魂
replies.txt_content: 自己看这边是0查看

replies.author: mikejasondragon
replies.txt_content: 怎么用？emmmm

replies.author: 蓝之魂
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 蓝之魂 于 2020-3-4 17:43 编辑 
mikejasondragon 发表于 2020-3-4 03:39
怎么用？emmmm
你复制到插件自带的defaultweapons里面，然后输入/shot give [玩家] mie就能获得灭绝者了，同理，输入/shot give [玩家] [枪械代号]就能获得制定枪械了
